subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: Coe, a Briton who was once the world’s best middle-distance runner, takes the helm at the I.A.A.F. amid questions about a potential conflict of interest and the dark cloud of doping.
snippet: Coe, a Briton who was once the world’s best middle-distance runner, takes the helm at the I.A.A.F. amid questions about a potential conflict of interest and the dark cloud of doping.
